2022-12-01.name: Bentleyville Tour of Lights
2022-12-01.summary:
Tour the retro-cool lighted decorations in Bayfront Festival Park, including a tree that dances to music, Dinosaurland and Penguin Park, and visit with Santa and Mrs. Claus.
There's free hot chocolate, cookies, popcorn and marshmallows to roast over fire pits. Bring cash or food to donate to food shelves.

2022-12-02.name: Bentleyville Tour of Lights

2022-12-02.name: Christmas Walk and House Tour
2022-12-02.summary: In this northwest Illinois town, Santa Lucia arrives in a horse-drawn carriage on Friday and hands out Swedish cookies, then Santa lights the Great Tree and opens his Gingerbread House. There's shopping amid strolling carolers. A tour of five houses is Friday and Saturday.

2022-12-02.name: Christkindli Market
2022-12-02.summary: In this Swiss town, the outdoor Christmas market downtown features decorated mini-chalets, food and music.
